title: Kelly Osbourne says she’s ‘proud to be a nepo baby’
description: Kelly Osbourne has hit back at critics who have called her a “nepo baby” by saying she’s “proud” of that status. Osbourne, 39, is the daughter of Black Sabbath frontman Ozzy Osbourne and his manager Sharon Osbourne. She first shot to fame in 2002 when the family appeared together on the groundbreaking MTV reality show The Osbournes.

title: It’s 2024 and Piers Morgan is still talking about Meghan Markle
description: A leopard never changes its spots and that’s certainly true of Piers Morgan, who can’t seem to let go of his obsession with Meghan Markle. It is now 2024 yet the TalkTV host, 58, apparently had nothing better to discuss than a two-year-old feud with the Duchess of Sussex, 42, and her husband Prince Harry, 39.

title: Prince William Visited Kate Middleton in the Hospital After Her Surprise Surgery
description: Prince William is stepping up to the plate as a supportive husband after it was announced that Kate Middleton was hospitalized following an abdominal surgery.
